pkgmetadata.longdescription: JSON Schema Himarc==================Validate instance using `Himarc JSON schema <https://github.com/CIEPS/json-schema-himarc>`_V1.0.3... code-block:: python from json_schema_himarc import validate_himarc, get_himarc_validation_errors ) instance = {} if not validate_himarc(instance): errors = get_himarc_validation_errors(instance)
